alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MUSKINGUM COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Perry State Forest, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Philo, Pleasant Grove, Fultonham, Ruraldale, Cannelville, Duncan Falls, East Fultonham, and Blue Rock State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 151 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
